Info.Name: Ron Swanson
Info.Reason: Wants to get as far away from people as he can

Info.Name: Eliza Sanders
Info.History: Teaches molecular science\nBelieves the body is the cure for everything

Info.History: Has loved magic his whole life\nWants nothing more than to entertain people
Info.Reason: Traveling and working to make a name for himself

Info.History: Owner of a once great circus\nBusiness is dying out
Info.Reason: Traveling to find new circus talent and performers

Name: St. Joseph Danely
History: Has been in the army for ten years
Reason: Finally coming home from the battle fronts

Info.Name: David Freeman
Info.History: Sells kitchen products to provide for his family
Info.Reason: Selling kitchen products on the train

Info.Name: Jack Bains
Info.History: Working hard to get to the top of his comapny

Info.Name: Summer Breeze
Info.History: Completely against the goverment and wants a world with no rules
Info.Reason: Going to a rally to protest war

Info.Name: Lily Peterson
Info.History: Never thought she would ever find love
Info.Reason: Recently married and going on her honeymooon
